reviewText: The first DVD I received was formatted improperly.  Amazon immediately replaced it and the replacement plays perfectly.  It is exactly what I expected and is a great WWII movie.
Poor sound and video quality B&W WW2 propaganda films, not even worth cost of shipping
Some vintage wartime propaganda. Maybe a bit corny by today's standards but a real part of history.
Is a burned DVD-R (not a normal DVD) which though supposed to be all-regions would not even recognize it as a disc in Windows Media Player, Apple DVD Player, or on a DVD/VHS player.
